item.title: Republican AG Miyares says race against Democrat Jay Jones is 'test of decency' amid text scandal
item.description: Virginia Attorney General Jason Miyares says his reelection campaign against Democrat Jay Jones has become a "test of decency for the commonwealth."

item.title: House Democrats want answers over White House's handling of Homan bribery allegations
item.description: House Democrats want to know how the White House handled bribery allegations against border czar Tom Homan.
